mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ A , TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ B WHERE A.CNTR_NO = B.CNTR_NO AND A.CNTR_SN = B.CNTR_SN AND A.CNTR_CST_NO = B.CNTR_CST_NO AND A.IN_CHNL_DV_CD = '1' AND A.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD IN ('1', '3') AND B.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('71', '72') AND B.WK_CAN_RSON_CD IS NULL AND A.FST_RGST_USR_ID = #{userId}
